name: RabiesTestsForRabiesVirusAntibody
title: Rabies (Tests for rabies virus Antibody)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Rabies virus antibody in any specimen type.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Rabies virus Ab;  

LOINC search:  'rabies Ab -isolate'),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
